hero.title: Vine Church Cambridge
hero.subtitle: A Church of Overcomers
hero.description: Building a church of overcomers, where every member is a priest and every home an extension of the church, conquering our generation for Christ through multiplying cells.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A Church of Overcomers
about.content: What does it mean to be a church of overcomers? It means being a church that fulfills God's purpose. And what is that purpose? To have a group of people in His image and likeness. God desires to fill man with Himself, with His life, in order to express Himself. So that man may have His dominion and represent Him on Earth.
about.content2: Man was created as a vessel to contain God within himself. We were made like a glove to contain God. The glove is the image and likeness of the hand, but the hand is the reality of the glove. A glove is created according to the likeness of the hand for the purpose of containing it. Likewise, man was created in the image of the Lord for the purpose of containing Divinity.
about.content3: Once man receives the Person of God as life within himself, he becomes an instrument in His hands.
about.content4: For man to be used as an instrument, God gave him the following command: Be fruitful, multiply, fill the earth and subdue it; rule over the fish of the sea, over the birds of the heavens, and over every animal that crawls on the earth. (Gen 1:28)
about.visionText: Our mission is to build a church of overcomers, where every member is a priest and every home an extension of the church, conquering our generation for Christ through multiplying life groups.
about.cellChurchText: We gather not only in the church building, but also in homes where we break bread together and share in each other's lives, following the model of Acts 2:42-44.
about.historyText: Vine Church began in 1997 in the city of Goiânia, Goiás, Brazil. In recent years, God has blessed us in an extraordinary way and today we are more than 1300 churches and about 300 thousand members spread throughout the world. In Canada we are present in Toronto and Cambridge for the glory of the Lord Jesus.

values.title: What we value
values.subtitle: Based on the Early Church of Acts of the Apostles
values.unityDesc: We realize that one of the characteristics of the Early Church was unity. The Bible says they were unanimous in everything they did.
values.teachingDesc: We believe that the Bible is the Word of God. Therefore, we always value faithful teaching of the Scriptures from the youngest to the oldest.
values.prayerDesc: We were created to have a relationship of intimacy with God. One of the ways we obtain this intimacy is through prayer.
values.serviceDesc: According to God's Word we should do good to all, especially to those of the family of faith. We love to be blessers.
values.fellowshipDesc: More than a church, Christ's disciples lived a shared life, for one another. It was the Community of Disciples.
values.discipleshipDesc: Go and make disciples. This is the Great Commission. More than preaching the Gospel, we want to make disciples of Christ Jesus.
values.loveDesc: Love God above all things and love your neighbor as yourself. Two commandments that we seek to live in a practical way.
values.childrenDesc: We believe we should teach children to walk in the Lord's way. Our motto is: children don't give trouble, children bear fruit.
values.multiplicationDesc: God's will is that all should be saved and come to the full knowledge of the Truth. We want to make a difference in our generation.
